subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Third-seeded Maria Sharapova, who had an uncharacteristically tumultuous summer, has bursitis in her right shoulder. It is the same shoulder she had surgery on in 2008.
snippet: Third-seeded Maria Sharapova, who had an uncharacteristically tumultuous summer, has bursitis in her right shoulder. It is the same shoulder she had surgery on in 2008.
